    All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values

    A

    addPoint(PricePoint) - Method in class data.StockData
    Adds a single PricePoint to the stock data list and updates max/min prices.
    addPoints(ArrayList<PricePoint>) - Method in class data.StockData
    Adds multiple PricePoint objects to the stock data list and updates max/min prices.
    addStockData(StockData) - Method in class graphing.GraphingManager
    Adds a single StockData set to the current list of data to be plotted.
    analyzeSentimentFor(StockData) - Method in class sentiment.SentimentManager
    Fetches news headlines for the given stock data's ticker symbol, analyzes the sentiment of those headlines, caches the results, and returns the sentiment score.
    AppController - Class in core
    The AppController class manages the application's main logic and coordination between different managers such as graphing, simulation, stock data fetching, prediction, and sentiment analysis.
    AppController() - Constructor for class core.AppController
    Constructs a new AppController instance and initializes its managers: GraphingManager, SimulationManager, PredictionManager, and SentimentManager.
